imdb.plot outline: Bad advice can be an awful drag. Meet Fabby, the outrageously opinionated and utterly fabulous answer to all of life's questions. Fabby's the queen of answering letters from all of her subjects on every subject! From crafting to cooking to living to love, Fabby always knows best.
imdb.title: Fabby Knows Best
plot: Professional Bon Vivant Fabby Von Johnson gives advice on love, life and all things Fabbylous in her humorous and heartfelt video advice column.::Stage17

Bad advice can be an awful drag. Meet Fabby, the outrageously opinionated and utterly fabulous answer to all of life's questions. Fabby's the queen of answering letters from all of her subjects on every subject! From crafting to cooking to living to love, Fabby always knows best.::Stage17
